reviews.text: Staff always polite, friendly, willing and able to help. They always look like they enjoy their job and provide a welcome smile.

This station (Portsmouth Harbour) is badly in need of an upgrade HOWEVER generally speaking, it's a clear, easy to navigate train station right in the heart of Portsmouth...lovely views of the harbour...
Quite convenient to connect the Wightlink ferry service and you can visit Portsmouth Historic Dockyard and Spinnaker Tower with Gunwharf shopping centre directly from this station.

I really want to thank all the staff that worked on 02/06/19  night shift especially Ms L.Gillman who helped me alot when I was completely stranded after missing my Coach, this lady did everything to help me and was able to give me a voucher for a night sleeper train.
I really don't know how or what to say to express my thanks but I pray that only God will bless you all and that you will continue helping other people as well.

Not everyone can appreciate what the entire team is doing,days and nights you are always helping people.

Thank you very much.
When you get out of the train you can see the HMS Warrior through the big window near the entrance/exit.
